item.title: Youtube video embed
item.description: Following online tutorial, here’s that paragliding video Pete shot yesterday: blogdown::shortcode("youtube", "yClRNHefT1M") There: how does that show up? Here’s another way to do, from goHugo site: Ah: that one works better -the code is obscured (NB: i followed text of article, not the video kid, because his <> bracketing arguments didn’t work; instead it was % signs bracketing arguments that worked)
